div.div: Outcomes from structure without using population data for Cardioglossa schioetzi.
div.p: Graph A) and bar plot C) depict the optimal K based on the Ln( K) K = 5, whereas graph B) and bar plot D) show the better K based on Evanno‘s method Δ K = 2. Each vertical bar represents an individual for which is shown the proportional genetic assignment to each cluster.
